# Public Finance & Regulation â€“ Fiscal Rules

## Fiscal Principles
- All fiscal actions must be legally authorized.
- Budgetary limits must be strictly enforced.
- Public funds usage must be transparent and accountable.

## Core Rules
- Expenditure must not exceed approved allocations.
- Fiscal adjustments must follow formal approval processes.
- Multi-year commitments must be explicitly recorded.

## Invariants
- Fiscal records must reconcile with approved budgets.
- Adjustments must be traceable and justified.
- Fiscal calculations must be reproducible.

## Prohibited
- Unauthorized fiscal reallocations
- Off-book or hidden expenditures
- Retroactive fiscal adjustments without authority
